headline: Is ConocoPhillips (COP) Among the Top Commodity Producers With the Highest Upside Potential?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Top 15 Commodity Producers With the Highest Upside Potential. In this article, we are going to take a look at where ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) stands against the other Commodity Producer stocks.
